00037 void DepthImageToPointCloudTransformation::transformDepthImageToPointCloud(IplImage *depthImage,
00038                 PointCloud3D *pointCloud, double threshold) {
00039 
00040         double x = 0.0;
00041         double y = 0.0;
00042         double z = 0.0;
00043         CvScalar pixel;
00044         double pixelValue = 0.0;
00045 
00046         /* check if input parameters are valid */
00047         if (depthImage == NULL || pointCloud == NULL) {
00048                 cerr << "ERROR: NULL pointer in input parameters" << endl;
00049                 return;
00050         }
00051 
00052         /* loop over all pixels and add those who are above a certain threshold */
00053         for (int row = 0; row < depthImage->height; ++row) {
00054                 for (int col = 0; col < depthImage->width; ++col) {
00055 
00056                         /* access pixel in image */
00057                         pixel = cvGet2D(depthImage, row, col);
00058                         pixelValue = pixel.val[0]; // assumption: input is gray scale
00059                         //cout << "pixelValue: " << pixelValue /*<< endl*/; //DBG
00060 
00061                         /* faster variant: (but should be more tested before usage) */
00062                         //double pixelValue_test = (double)(uchar)*(depthImage->imageData + row*depthImage->widthStep + col);
00063                         //cout << " pixelValue_test: " << pixelValue_test << endl; //DBG
00064                         //assert(pixelValue == pixelValue_test);
00065 
00066                         if (pixelValue >= threshold) {
00067                                 /* TODO is now uncalibrated */
00068                                 //x = col;
00069                                 //y = row;
00070                                 //z = pixelValue;
00071                                 x = col;
00072                                 assert((0.0 <= pixelValue) && (pixelValue <= 255.0)); //comment out for optimization
00073                                 y = MAX_DEPTHIMAGE_VALUE - pixelValue; // invert here because bright regions appears nearer (at least for zcam) TODO: check if this common
00074                                 z = depthImage->height - row; //flips the image (because of negative y axis definition in depth images)
00075                                 pointCloud->addPoint(Point3D(x,y,z));
00076                         }
00077                 }
00078         }
00079 
00080         /* plausibility check */
00081         assert(pointCloud->getSize() >= 0u && pointCloud->getSize() <= static_cast<unsigned int>(depthImage->imageSize));
00082 }
00083 
00084 }
00085
